welcome_desc: Build your brand’s recognition and get detailed insights on how your links are performing.
statistic_desc: Track how your links are performing across the web with our advanced statistics dashboard.
statistic_desc_1: Boost your brand recognition with each click. Generic links don’t mean a thing. Branded links help instil confidence in your content.
statistic_desc_2: Gain insights into who is clicking your links. Knowing when and where people engage with your content helps inform better decisions.
statistic_desc_3: Improve brand awareness and content discoverability through customizable links, supercharging audience engagement.
